package.name: glibc
package.description: This patch fixes a problem when nscd was accessing memory which was not properly initialized, eventually causing random cratches with varying frequency. It also fixes a problem with Chinese timezones. Value of MADV_REMOVE is fixed as well as page-related macros in . Superfluous inclusion of is removed.
